title: Aid the Underduke
content:
Aid the Underduke Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Guildhall Reward Ally in final battle

Aid the Underduke

Aid the Underduke is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Aid the Underduke can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Aid the Underduke Objectives

Visit the Guildhall

We overheard some gossip at Sharess' Caress. Nine Fingers, leader of the city'
